summary:
Procurement / Supply Chain Director in complex Global Supply Networks with more than 30 years experience. Demonstrated, by having lived and worked abroad for 13 years in Italy 🇮🇹, Belgium 🇧🇪, Poland🇵🇱 and Singapore 🇸🇬 . This with combining in depth practical experience in: Strategic Sourcing, Supply Chain Planning, Transportation and Warehousing and integrated knowledge on processes and systems in Supply Chain and Procurement. 
 
Offering high analytical, operational skills and leadership skills gained via :
A) 13 years working & living experience abroad, in 4 different countries / 2 different continents both in industrial-, commercial sites and at various headquarters all over the world. 
B) After that , 15+ years working experience in global and regional leadership roles in Procurement and Supply Chain.

Strategist and architect, developing a long term vision and related category strategy for example with respect to management of virtual supply chains due to outsourcing of non core activities to suppliers or setting up Indirect Procurement, but being pragmatic in translation this into a realistic roadmap.
Being able to drive results and structurally embed them into in the organization via process improvements that cover end to end solutions for Supply Chain environments. People manager and demonstrates continuously servant leadership as part of daily working practices.

Speaks the language of business as well as IT and can easily act on all levels in the organization. 
Solid understanding of other disciplines like: Finance, IT, Manufacturing, Marketing and Sales. 
Good sparring partner for Executive Management and highly supportive of new innovative company vision. Personality: Open, honest assertive and team player.

Certified in Production and Inventory Management (C.P.I.M.) on all modules 
Period:	1992-1993
 
University degree in nominal time: Industrial Engineering & Management Science at the University.
of Technology Eindhoven with specialisation in Supply Chain: Production & Inventory Management (Ir.)	Period: 	1986 - 1990

Languages:
Dutch, English, German, French, Italian, and Polish

Others:
Winning Team High Potential Talent Program Philips 2002
Board member Singapore Dutch school 
Board and President of Board of Lions Club Roermond

profile_positions.description:

Both via leveraging global connections as well as keeping a one ☝️ market focused approach in serving ABOs and Customers.

Global category co-responsible for Professional Services supporting A70 vision of Amway: “helping people to live a better healthier life“ via turning Passion into Products.
Professional Service meaning Human Capital for : Finance, Treasury, Banking, Legal, Business process outsourcing, Sales / Customer Service, HRM , Logistic Services and IT / Management Consultancy. In total about $250M in over 50 countries mainly executed via Global Business Shared Services Centers located in Poland 🇵🇱, Malaysia 🇲🇾 and China🇨🇳 

Combined with Procurement Regional leader role for Europe 🇪🇺 34 countries $100M and leading team of Global Senior Sourcing Managers with additional responsibilities for all other Indirect categories like Travel, Sales / Special Events, MRO, Physical Presence, Marketing, Digital, Transportation, Warehousing, Operations, Facility Management, Literature and Shipping Supplies. 
Also connection point to Direct Procurement for Europe about $50M and part of Supply Chain Management Team Europe headquartered in Venlo 🇳🇱 the Netherlands, united in Supply Chain Excellence.

Part of Global Procurement Leadership Team as well as European Executive Team. Europe includes South Africa and Australia & New Zealand.

profile_positions.description:
Increased speed to market by creating a smooth transition of the packaging and printing supply base, from conventional to digital print.

Responsible for the Sourcing Strategy for Literature and Shipping Materials of Amway Supply Chain Services in Europe.
Steering Tactically and Operational Senior Buyers and Buyers in the Netherlands, Poland and Russia. Part of the European Strategic Procurement group.

Amway is the largest direct selling company in the world, with sales of $9B and headquarters in Ada Michigan 🇺🇸 
 
Amway sells these articles under several brand names in over 80 markets. Independent resellers (so-called ABOs) sell cosmetics, cleaning and health products directly to consumers, without the involvement of the retail sector. Worldwide, Amway employs more than three million ABOs. 
 
Amway Supply Chain Services also operates 65 R&D laboratories and owns various product facilities, four farms and distribution centers all over the world. The Aliticor group as a whole employs 15,000 people worldwide.
